<template>
  
</template>

<script>


export default {
  name: 'GuestTag',
  
  props: {
    msg: String
  },
  data() {
   return {
      guests: [],
      slug:';'
   }
 },



  created() {
    this.slug=this.$route.params.slug
     
  },
  methods:{
    created() {
    axios.get('http://127.0.0.1:8000/guests/?search='+this.slug+'&search_fields=tag',)
    
    .then(response => {
      console.log(response.data)
      this.guests =response.data;
    })
    },
    changebought(guest,changenum){
      axios.put('http://127.0.0.1:8000/guests/'+guest.id+'/',
      {bought:changenum},
      {auth:{username:'paxx',password:'KSETpenisica43'}}
      )
      .then(()=> {
        this.created();
      })
      
    },
    searchGuest(){
      axios.get('http://127.0.0.1:8000/guests/?search=Brucoši '+this.search+"&search_fields=tag&search_fields=name&search_fields=surname",)
    .then(response => {
      this.guests =response.data;
    })
    }
  }
}
</script>
